attributes.title: AWFUL
attributes.review: the design of this up is so impractical, very hard to navigate. not to mention, it supports donny!!! who likes him? i know i don’t. so sure, i may have a biased opinion. but that doesn’t matter! if it mattered they wouldn’t let me write this review. now if you’ll excuse me, i’m headed to tiktok✨

attributes.title: so bad!
attributes.review: I tried to enter the app & ended up getting booted out for at least 30 mins. then when i finally got it working, i hated the layout! such a terrible/nonfunctional app. you would think if you’re a president you could design an app sorta well..

attributes.title: Needs work
attributes.review: This “Application” took a while to download. I was happy when it finish, then that’s when it all started. It asked me for my personal information, it didn’t even ask me out to dinner first :( I’ve never felt so used before.

attributes.title: ✨yucky✨
attributes.review: i was over the moon excited to support my wonderful 💕, caring💫, non racist🧚🏻‍♀️, and most definitely not orange🌷 president in any way that i could. i was overwhelmed with joy when i found out he had an app. as soon as i download it i was beyond disappointed. they asked for my phone number. my rights felt ~v i o l a t e d~. i should never under any circumstance have to give my personal information out to a phony belogna website! i am very disappointed in the way in which i was treated and will be deleting!

attributes.title: i hated it 😍✨
attributes.review: i only got it to support the orangest orangutan president❤️ but i then forgot i had to walk my goldfish🤬 i hate this app it made me forget and now my fish is dead😒😭 i will never support this guy anymore!!! (never did🥴✨) i am educated now 🤡🤡 imagine supporting this guy LMAOO ur either a clown or white!!! oh no.... [ JAKE🇺🇸🏈🎣 is typing... ] sHiVeR mE tiMbERs 😖😖😤

attributes.title: Absolute Garbage Doesn’t Work
attributes.review: This app does not work. At all. It crashes right when you open it nearly every time. There’s no use for it. Without fail it ceases to function. Will never recommend. What’s the point of this app?

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: This app is so bad, I was looking forward to seeing plans and such from our president and this app was very unhelpful and slow. Terrible app and I don’t recommend to anyone. Please don’t waste your time on this it’s worse then any other app I’ve ever delt with

attributes.title: My review
attributes.review: As a gen z trump supporter I think this generation needs to get educated and this app helps you

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: I initially got this app to see what his plans were with the world. i started seeing very unreasonable and terrible things that he was trying to do. i honestly don’t thing he has the right to have an app because what he’s trying to do is unacceptable.

attributes.title: Why I dislike this app
attributes.review: This app would spam me so much. I just wanted to be informed and it would send me messages every hour. It also too up too much data. Trump is such a horrible president this has been the longest term ever. let’s not vote for him again
